activities:
We collect data such as residential address, telephone number, email address and/or billing information in order to market to and charge our customers.  Specifically, we may use this personal data for such things as:
•	Tailoring the website experience for the customer according to their preferences.
•	Contacting the customer in the event of a change in the website’s Terms of Use and/or Privacy Policy.
•	Using name and email address to confirm registration into their accounts.
•	Using credit card information to fulfill the customer’s purchase.
•	Using the data internally for such things as advertising, data analysis, audits and fraud prevention purposes.

We retain the customers’ information for as long as the account is active but as necessary to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

We would potentially disclose personal information with third parties for marketing purposes unless the customer opts out of such programs or for data analytics purposes, order fulfillment, credit card processing and other types of administrative purposes.  We would also disclose in response to a subpoena, court order, or otherwise request for cooperation from law enforcement.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line and off-line data including certain customer personally identifiable information
